p: Basic characteristics of patients are shown in Table 1 and the study design is shown in Figure 1. In short, 70 severe and 95 mild influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 infected patients were enrolled. The mean age of the all patients was 12 years; 71.5% (118/165) were male. No significant differences were detected in the demographic variables (ages, age groups and sex proportion) between the severe and mild patient groups.
